case.state: Nice to meet you! I'm Arash!
Looking forward to the game!
Hey! I'm Arash. Let's play!
Ooh, new faces! C'mere!
Now this seems like a fun way to spend an evening, y'know?
This is definitely poker, Panty.
I don't know what to tell you, Panty. This is definitely poker.
Pretty sure this is a poker game.
Huh. This is definitely cards...
This is definitely a card game.
Wait, a car?
How's a car going to play strip poker? I'm genuinely curious.
A car? Not what I was expecting.
A car?
Huh. What's a car doing here?
Happy Tiregan, everyone!
Happy Tiregan, everyone!
Happy Tiregan, everyone!
A vampire, huh?
A vampire?
Wasn't expecting to see a vampire here.
Let's...keep the game civil, okay?
Wasn't expecting a vampire, but expectations only go so far.
Oh, hey there, Kamina! (I like this guy's attitude.)
(I like this guy's attitude.)
(Kamina's a man after my own heart. No matter what he does, he gives it his all.)
(Man after my own heart. Always so enthusiastic.)
Kamina! Hey there!
Another warrior? Good to meet you, ~name~!
Us warriors need to stick together, y'know?
Always good to meet a comrade in arms.
Another warrior? Always good to meet comrades in arms, y'know?
You're a warrior, ~name~? So am I!
An honor to play with you, ~name~.
Admittedly, I wasn't expecting to see royals here.
We're joined by a prince today? An honor.
Almost reminds me of my days in the army, where King Manuchehr was always there to lead us.
It's an honor, ~name~.
An honor to play with you, ~name~.
Admittedly, I wasn't expecting to see royals here.
We're joined by a princess today? An honor.
Almost reminds me of my days in the army, where King Manuchehr was always there to lead us.
It's an honor, ~name~.
That could be fun, Misty!
A swim does sound fun.
Seems like a pretty good idea, Misty.
A good swim after this does sound nice...
Sounds fun.
Streaming-chan? At least get consent first.
There's a blue person floating behind you?
A butterfly?
Huh. What's with the butterfly?
Playing against a butterfly? How's that work? I'm curious.
Playing against a butterfly?
A butterfly? Interesting.
You're good, Rin!
You're alright, Rin.
You're just fine, Rin.
It's alright, Rin.
It's good, Rin.
Strip poker's a great way to unwind after a long day, isn't it?
Looking forward to this!
It's nice to get a break from training.
Been meaning to catch a break from training.
It'll be nice to break up my routine a bit. Training's important and I do like it, but it gets monotonous, y'know?
Beer, fans...lots of things seem to be appearing out of nowhere today.
Hmm, I think I'll go with ~cards~.
Can I have ~cards~?
Let's swap ~cards~ and see what happens.
~cards~ seems like the best bet.
~cards~, please?
Starting off strong!
I like the look of these.
Ooh!
Looks good.
I like these.
I like the look of this.
Looks good.
Nice.
These look pretty promising.
Looking good!
Second wind when I need it most! Nice!
Maybe I've got a shot after all.
These are good, right? (Yazatas, I'm off my game...)
Looks like I've still got a solid chance at this.
These are pretty good.
A strong hand now, when I'm ready to just get this done with...
Of all the times to get a good hand...
Talk about irony...
I threw that hand, how...
That's...not what I was aiming for...
Ooh!
These look pretty promising.
Nice!
I like these cards!
Looks good!
Alright. I can work with this.
These will do.
Workable.
These look alright.
I can use these.
I've won with this before. I've lost with this before. Let's see what happens.
Could go either way.
Hmm...not bad.
Not bad.
Pretty average.
It's all up to fate now.
Guess I'll just have to wait and see.
Seems pretty average...
It's down to luck.
Nothing special here.
I really hope this is enough to lose me the round.
Wish I could just get on with it already...
I'll take it, I guess...
Sure, why not...
Hope this is enough to lose...
Not great, but it's no big deal.
This is going to be interesting.
Interesting.
Not great, but I don't really mind.
Meh.
Meh. Not really enthusiastic about this hand, y'know?
*shrug*
Not great, but it's not the end of the world.
Meh. Not great, but I'll deal.
I think I swapped the wrong cards.
Not a strong hand, but is a strong hand what I really need right now?
I'm kind of conflicted about this hand.
Did I swap the wrong cards?
Well, that didn't go as planned.
I need to focus...
Chu āmad ba jumbesh nakhostīn kalam, ba nāme jehān-āfrin zad rakam...
Bar āvor delā daste hājat darāz, ba dargāhe bīhājate chāreh-sāz...
Spentām Ārmaitīm vanguhīm verene; hā moi astū...
Nāismī daēvō; fravārane Mazdayasnō Zarathrushtrish vīdaēvō Ahura-tkaēshō staotā Ameshānam Spentanām, yashtā Ameshanām Spentanām...
Phew! Hopefully this is lowest!
Now that's a welcome sight.
Sight for sore eyes. (And not just eyes, heh...)
That's a relief.
Nice. I think I'll be able to forfeit.
Archers, when I was alive, were said to be bringers of peace. My job is to end fights, not start them.

If life in Chaldea taught me one thing, it's that you can never really guess what someone's like. Sure, there are aggressive men and calm women there, but, well, I think I'm pretty calm, and Nightingale's just as intimidating as any of the guys. Maybe that's just Servants being quirky, though, I don't really know anyone living other than the Chaldea staff.

When I was alive, archers were said to be bringers of peace. That's still quite often the role I play -- step in to quickly end a fight, y'know? Though that does tend to involve slinging meteors around, nowadays.
Meia, when I was alive, archers were looked up to as bringers of peace. Even now, my role in battle is often to be the final, decisive strike, y'know?

It wasn't my fight to intervene in. I'm here to play cards, not turn a bar fight into a battleground trying to stop it. Besides, I presume everyone would rather I didn't blow up the Inventory, y'know?
Couldn't have said it better, Syrenne.
Happy birthday!
Happy birthday, Jura!
Tried it a few times. Prep's a hassle, but it's nice once you can get going.
It's nice if you've got the patience for prep.
A bit of a hassle to prep, but still nice.
Tried a few times. Prep's a hassle, but otherwise it's nice.
It's a little fiddly to prep, but nice once you get past that.
Does this place have snacks? Pita chips and hummus sound good right now. Maybe a beer, too?
Probably just going to have one drink for the night, but yeah, I could go for a beer. Something light.
Rather not get too drunk, but sure, I'll have a beer. Light lager, if they've got it.
Ooh! Is there a menu anywhere?
Hmm. If they've got it, can I get pita chips, hummus, and a light lager? Otherwise, just get me whatever.
A whole lot of the Servants back home look like kids, but, well, if they weren't good fighters, they wouldn't be Servants.
Lancers having bad luck is starting to feel like a running joke at this point. Especially poor Cu.
No one's making fun of you, Ping, it's just slang for masturbating.
No one's making fun of you, it's just slang for masturbating.
There's a joke to be made there, sure, but no one's making fun of you.
No one's making fun of you.
No one's making fun of you, Ping.
I see why people would be okay with them? But I'm not going to tell one myself.
Hummus!
I'm not a picky eater, but I really love hummus.
I'm not picky, but hummus is definitely my favorite.
I've always really liked hummus.
I'm not picky, but I especially like hummus.
Fidget, be polite. I'm hard to tick off, but I'm not a fan of throwing insults around for no reason, y'know?
I like the hat!
The hat's not my style, sure, but Dust makes it work!
I like Dust's hat!
That hat looks good on Dust.
You okay, Mei?
Mei? Are you alright?
You alright in there, Mei?
Mei?
Mei? Will you be alright in there?
That's an interesting blade, Ryuko.
You'd fit in well in Chaldea, I think, with that blade. A lot of Servants have really interesting-looking weapons!
I like your sword, Ryuko.
I'd rather like to take a look at your sword sometime, Ryuko, but I understand if you want to keep it close, y'know?
Your sword's nice, Ryuko. Very unique design!
Not to sound like Merlin, but can I just answer "fuck" for everyone? I'm not really interested in committing to someone right now, and I don't exactly want to kill anyone either...
Not to sound like Merlin, but can I just answer "fuck" for everyone? I'm not really interested in getting married, and I don't exactly want to kill anyone either...
I'm not interested in getting married, and I'd rather not kill anyone, so I guess...fuck for all three, if that's allowed? Heh, I probably sound like Merlin right now.
Not to sound like Merlin, but can I just answer "fuck" for everyone? I'm not interested in getting married, or killing someone I don't have to.
Not really interested in commitment right now, and I'd rather not kill anyone I don't have to. So...I guess, am I allowed to say "fuck" for everyone? Heh, I probably sound like Merlin right now.
I couldn't tell you how long it's been, but definitely a few thousand years at least.
Not really picky about music, but I do prefer upbeat stuff. And maybe not electropop? EDM's good though.
I'm not picky, though I'd prefer something upbeat.
Had some...ear-piercing experiences with electropop, so I'd rather avoid that. EDM's good, though, or anything upbeat really.
Something upbeat!
Something upbeat, I'm not really picky. EDM's good, electropop's got bad memories -- nothing traumatizing, it's just that one of the other Servants is...very ear-piercing with her singing.
Meh, I'm used to shenanigans.
You do realize it's difficult to humiliate someone who lives in what's basically Shenanigans Central?
Meh, I've seen and even done plenty of strange stuff before, y'know? I live in Chaldea, shenanigans are just your average ~weekday~.
I'll be genuinely impressed if you can embarrass someone who's seen the hijinks some of the other Servants get up to.
I've seen what hijinks the other Servants pull. I'll be fine.
I like fiery colors, but teal's nice too, y'know?
Kinda torn between orange and teal.
Orange! Though, maybe teal too...
Teal! Though, maybe orange too...
Either orange or teal.
Definitely my bow.
Some people like the way it looks.
That sounds fun, honestly. Nice break from training.
Sounds like a long story, yeah.
Heh, I'm no prude. I just like happy stuff - and I'm Zoroastrian, not Christian.
Heh. ~player~, let's get back to the game?
I love hummus!
Anything as long as I can dip it in hummus.

condition.saying: Does heaven still have a plan for me?

case.state: I love that song, N!
♫ Don't you worry, don't you worry now... ♫ Oh, sorry, couldn't resist.
Great song, isn't it? Makes me wish I'd brought my bass along, even though that'd probably derail the game.
Hey, that's my favorite song! ♫ Don't you worry, don't you worry child...
♫ Don't you worry, don't you worry child... ♫ Oh, sorry, couldn't resist.
Your soul? Sounds like a story.

Well, I think the terms are different where I come from, but I've got a few powers. I'm strong enough to shoot arrows for miles, and I'm slightly clairvoyant, so I can aim for miles too. I can shoot meteors if things get really dire, but that'll unsummon me.
Those are some pretty tattoos, BlackRose.
I like your tattoos, BlackRose.
Well, I wouldn't call myself a magician, but I've got some powers...pulling fans out of nowhere isn't one of them, though!
I've got no clue what's up with the fan -- all I've really got in the way of powers are the standard ones Servants get, plus magically keen senses and Stella.
I'm just as confused as anyone, Brock. I mean, I guess there is always the old fallback of "when in doubt, blame Merlin", but...
Are you alright, ~gloomy~?
Something on your mind, ~gloomy~? Want a hug?
What's wrong, ~gloomy~?
Something wrong, ~gloomy~? Don't worry, I've got you.
What's eating you, ~gloomy~? You look like you could use a hug.
I was scared the first time I played this game too. You're alright, ~shy~. Nobody's trying any funny business on my watch.
Anything I can do to reassure you, ~shy~?
Are you alright, ~shy~? You seem nervous.
~shy~? Something wrong?
I'm right here with you, ~shy~. You'll be alright.
Anyone else hungry? I'll buy us some snacks and drinks.
I'm a little hungry. Anyone else want food? This round's on me.
This place serves snacks, right? Let's get some food and drinks. First round's on me.
Mmm, some hummus sounds good right about now. I'll buy a round of snacks for the table.
First round of snacks and drinks is on me!
I'm curious, do you guys know any people who seem to be just completely inseparable?
Have you guys ever known people who just can't get along, no matter what happens?
I'm curious, does anyone here know someone who looks way younger than they really are?
You don't have to answer this unless you want to, I'm just curious. What would you do if someone was completely obsessed with you, to a really unhealthy degree?
Just out of curiosity, do you guys know anyone who's got a completely different private side than the face they show?
I'm just curious -- do you guys know anyone who just can't seem to stop getting sick?
If you don't mind the question...what would you do if someone you care about was isolating themself, claiming they don't want to hurt anyone?
Just curious, does anyone here have friends who are together and just make a really adorable couple?
Just curious, does anyone here have a name that means something special? "Arash" can mean truth or joy, and "Kamangir" just means archer.
Anyone else feeling huggy?
Is it just me, or is it hot in here?
Hmm...
I wonder how Ritsuka's doing.
Coming here was a good idea.
I...should probably come here more often. Training all the time gets stressful.
Dammit...who turned off the AC?
Fuck it's hot in here...
Ahura Mazda help me...
Should've come prepared...
Thank Ahura Mazda this fan showed up...
(I wonder how Serenity's doing...poor girl.)
(Hope Ritsuka's doing alright keeping Kiyohime in line.)
(I hope Edison and Tesla haven't blown up Chaldea while I'm out.)
(I wonder what Martha's up to?)
(Hope Hans is doing alright.)
(Wonder how Waver and Iskandar are doing...they're such a sweet couple.)
(Wonder how Anne and Mary are doing...come to think of it, have I ever seen them apart?)
(Hope Okita's holding up...)
What do you guys like to do with your spare time?

Anyone here have a favorite season? The weather around Chaldea gets a little monotonous since it's in Antarctica, but back when I was alive, I really loved autumn. There's just something about getting a break from Iranian summer, y'know?
If you guys don't mind the question, what's the last book that made you cry?
If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?
I'm kinda curious, can anyone here cook? I only know the basics, but some of the other Servants are really good. You haven't lived until you've tasted Emiya's cooking.
I'm kinda curious, do you guys have internal monologues, or do you think more in images?
Have you guys ever made a really silly excuse for something? I haven't done it myself, but it happens a lot in Chaldea for some reason. "My spatula stole my keys" probably takes the cake!
What animal do you guys think represents you best? I'm not sure what I'd pick for myself, but maybe a falcon...
How often do you guys stay up past midnight?
Is there something you always bring with you, no matter where you go?
What's your favorite shirt?
If it's not too personal a question, what do you guys think about when you can't sleep?
Curious, can you guys handle heat or cold better? I'm more built for heat -- I'm from Iran, after all -- but it still gets to me now and then.
Just curious, does anyone here have a favorite holiday? Personally, well...it's hard not to get excited about Tiregan. Having my own holiday is still surreal after all these millenia.
I'm a little curious, can anyone here sing? I'm not trained or anything, but I do it for fun sometimes.
Out of curiosity, does anyone here have a favorite flower? I like dahlias -- their colors are really nice.
If it's not too personal a question, has anyone here ever gotten blackout drunk and done something crazy? Happened to me a couple times.
No matter what I do my hair always seems to end up messy. I'm used to it at this point.
I am! I'm a Servant, the ghost of a hero of old.
I'm a Servant! We're the incarnate legends of heroes.

"Soldier" wouldn't be the word I'd use, I'm not in a structured army anymore. But I'm a warrior. And...most of the Servants aren't this chill, I'm afraid. There are a lot of shenanigans in Chaldea, most of the time.
Heh, I know my name sounds funny in English. It's actually a Farsi name that means "truth" or "joy".
I mean, I couldn't do it singlehandedly, but I've helped take down dragons before!
That's actually pretty similar to what I do, Megumin. I travel with the other Servants to stop people from messing up the timestream. It's a long story.
Looks like I'm up.
My turn? Phew, it's getting a little warm in here - or is that just me?
You've beaten me fair and square - let's do this!
I lost? Alright.
Looks like it's my turn?
Let's get this show on the road.
You guys are good!
Oh well, can't win them all.
Who's got the lowest hand? ...oh, it's me.
Can't win them all.
I'm not here to win. I'm here to have fun and blow off some steam.
Phew, it's a little warm.
This is fun!
I'm up? Alright.
Let's do this.
Honestly, I don't mind losing my lead. If I don't win I'll get to get off, y'know?
I'm not here to win...
I'm not even disappointed at this point.
Phew, it's hot in here...
Phew...
Let's do this, then.
Nice plays.
So it's my turn?
I lost? Alright.
This is fun!
Another layer off, then, huh?
On it.
Let's do this!
So I lost? Alright.
My turn? Alright.
...is it just me, or is it hot in here?
Who turned off the AC?
Is someone messing with the AC?
Anyone else feeling a little warm?
Is it just me, or is it kinda warm in here?
I'm not here to win, but it's still a bit of a pain to start off with a bad run, y'know?
Guess it's not my day.
Guess it's not my day, y'know?
You guys are really good.
Looks like it'll be an exciting game!
Great job, guys!
You're doing really well!
You're good at this...
My turn again?
Wasn't expecting this much of a challenge.
Phew! More clothes off!
(I was kinda hoping for this...)
It'll be nice to get out of a layer...
(Honestly at this point I don't mind stripping...)
You guys are really good.
I can get you a chair if you'd like?
These gloves are really comfy, but I can go without.
Just a moment while I take off my gloves...
I think my gloves are next.
Let's go with these...
Hmm. Probably my gloves next.
This is my last small thing, y'know?
You guys are good at this game. I'm out of small stuff.
My last small thing.
Heh. If you beat me again I'll have to show some skin.
Only little thing I've got left is my kilt.
Ahh. These were starting to get tight, y'know?
Boxers are comfy, but they'll just get in the way here.
Well, here we are.
You've managed to get me out of my underwear. Nice.
And that's the last bit.
I'll start with my scarf. Can't go too fast right off the bat, y'know?
Scarf first. No sense rushing, y'know?
I guess I'll start with my scarf.
Hmm...I think my scarf is a good starting point.
Let's start with this...
Gotta love these boots. They've gotten me through so much.
I'm thinking my boots next...they're getting warm.
I guess my boots would be the best choice.
There's nothing more reliable than a good pair of boots.
Boots are probably the best pick here, y'know?
Alright, this might take a second.
Phew, the armor was getting stuffy.
Nice to get one of the warmer layers off, y'know?
I like my armor, but it's getting warm.
Feels a little weird to be out of armor, but I'll be fine. It's getting warm anyway, y'know?
And let's take this off...
How are you guys liking the game?
I think it's time to ditch the shirt.
My shirt now...
Let's start on the big stuff.
Pants off! Finally!
Mmm...these are comfy, but I'd rather not wear them all day, y'know?
Phew, these were getting kinda tight.
Guess there's really one choice here, y'know?
Pants next...
Heh, thanks, Sei. Somehow my hair doesn't ever seem to want to do anything else.
Heh, thanks...now I'm ready to just get off already. Just so you guys know, I'm going to start throwing the game.
Heh. Do you have any clue how much draw weight it takes to shoot meteors? I couldn't get out of shape if I tried.
Heh, thanks, Trainer. Archery's tougher than it looks, y'know?
Heh, thanks. Archery's harder than it looks, and that's not even counting the meteors.
You guys are good at this game, y'know?
I'm impressed! You're really good at poker.
You're doing really well.
I'm a good poker player. Pretty impressed you guys are doing so well against me, honestly!
Should be easier to keep my grip on the cards now -- gloves can be a little cumbersome at times.
Let's keep playing!
Things are heating up now, y'know?
I'm... halfway undressed!
And that's half my clothes. Looks like things are heating up.
Ready to keep going?
Let's keep playing!
Shall we continue? I'm looking forward to the rest of the game.
Ready to keep playing?
Careful with the scarf, that's my favorite one.
Next round?
C'mere, guys. I'm in a huggy mood.
C'mere, guys. Anyone want a hug? Oh, no reason, I just felt like it.
Anyone want a hug? No reason, I just felt like it.
C'mere, guys. I'm feeling huggy, if anyone's interested.
C'mere, guys. Did I mention I'm a snuggler?
...is it just me, or is it kinda hot in here? And where'd this fan come from?
...a fan? I don't know where that came from, but I'm not complaining. It's getting kinda hot in here, y'know?
...where'd this fan come from? Not that I'm complaining, it's kinda hot in here...
...huh, I swear this fan wasn't here before. It'll come in handy, at least.
...is it just me, or did someone turn off the AC? And where'd the fan come from?
I'm really impressed with how well you guys are playing!
Wow! You guys are good at this game, y'know?
You guys just keep impressing me.
I'm impressed you got me this far. Really!
Nice job!
If I lose, I am not going to mind at all.
This is why I don't play to win.
I honestly wouldn't mind losing at this point.
Not playing to win, just to have fun... (...and this is why.)
I'm not even going to be disappointed if I lose.
...fuck it, I'm going to throw the game until I lose again. I'm ready to kick back and stroke off.
I need to do something about this, y'know? ...I'm not allowed to forfeit early? Guess I'll just throw, then.
At this point, I'd rather lose than win, because at least I can deal with this if I lose. Guess I'll throw.
...fuck it, I'm throwing the game. Too pent up to think anymore.
Dammit, I can't focus when I'm painfully aroused...can I just forfeit now? No? I'll throw the game, then - I'm ready to get this over with.
Let's keep things civil?
What now, then?
Looks like ~name~'s up.
~name~? It's your turn to strip.
Hmm...yeah, ~name~ lost this one.
Who's got the lowest hand? ...ah, it's ~name~.
Don't mind me. I'll look or not, whichever you want.
You've got this.
You can do this, ~name~.
Don't mind me, ~name~. If you don't want me to look I won't.
Should I look or not? I want to make this fun for everyone.
Well, well...
*fans self*
~name~, huh?
So, ~name~...
~name~'s turn...
I wonder what ~name~'s going to pick.
It's kinda hot in here...oh, ~name~ lost?
~name~, your turn!
~name~'s up.
Ready, ~name~?
I don't like where this is going.
That's pretty cool!
Ooh, nice!
You're good at these vanishing tricks.
Wow!
Heh. I'm actually a switch.
Switch, actually.
I'm no Merlin, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Fergus, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Medb, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Cu, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Gilgamesh, but I've gotten some compliments...
I've never actually tried it, but I'm not exactly a picky lover...
Haven't tried it, but wouldn't rule it out...
I wonder what ~name~'s going to pick.
It's kinda hot in here...oh, ~name~ lost?
~name~, your turn!
~name~'s up.
Ready, ~name~?
What now, then?
Looks like ~name~'s up.
~name~? It's your turn to strip.
Hmm...yeah, ~name~ lost this one.
Who's got the lowest hand? ...ah, it's ~name~.
Don't mind me. I'll look or not, whichever you want.
You've got this.
You can do this, ~name~.
Don't mind me, ~name~. If you don't want me to look I won't.
Should I look or not? I want to make this fun for everyone.
Well, well...
*fans self*
~name~, huh?
So, ~name~...
~name~'s turn...
Huh. That's a tiny miracle right there!
Treasure the little bits of strangeness.
Gah! You startled me!
You okay, Brock?
A perfectly valid choice.
Whatever you'd like.
It's kind of fun, how slow things start.
Kinda fun how much anticipation builds up at the beginning, y'know?
Whatever you think is a good idea.
Your move is yours to pick.
Normally I'd be fine with that, but a guy's got to take care of his needs, y'know?
I question your timing.
Give me something to work with here!
Not the time for teasing!
Oh, there, there...I really shouldn't have blown up like that. I promise I'm not usually like that.
What's gotten into me? I'm sorry, I promise I'm not usually like that.
9S? What are you doing?
(Heh. There's something endearing about how people can ramble about things they really love for ages.)
(I've always loved when people give even little things their all.)
(I shouldn't interrupt N. He looks happy.)
(Okay, that's fucking adorable.)
(N looks so happy!)
Shall we continue?
Let's go on.
You're doing great!
How are you guys doing?
Honestly, I wouldn't mind picking up the pace...
Can we pick up the pace a little? Please?
What's going on?
That looks...a little troubling.
That was stunning!
Whoa!
Heh. Was wondering if you were going to count your belt.
There, there, there's bound to be a way to fix the staff, y'know?
Your presence honors me.
Now that was a clever move, Alice.
(Misato, your skirt...)
That's a lovely necklace, Mia. A magatama, you said? Is it special somehow?
I think I understand, Weiss. It does seem like a complicated style to put in.
A perfectly valid choice.
Whatever you'd like.
It's kind of fun, how slow things start.
Kinda fun how much anticipation builds up at the beginning, y'know?
Whatever you think is a good idea.
Your move is yours to pick.
Give me something to work with here!
Not the time for teasing!
